name: Claws & Feathers 2
description:
Click and drag birds across dozens of levels in an attempt to match and remove three or more of your fine-feathered friends, thereby clearing the way to the items you need. Throughout this wild and wacky adventure, you'll search for cleverly guarded artifacts, use awesome bonuses, and control a variety of birds. Plan ahead, and you'll have no trouble removing the obstacles in your way! Bright, colorful graphics, upbeat music, and a hilarious storyline will keep you entertained until the end. So either shiver your timbers or get ready to walk the plank, because the battle has begun, and the fur is gonna fly!Upsell features:
  • Awesome bonuses
  • Pirate-themed locations
  • Dozens of challenging levels
  • A variety of birds and cats
  • Gorgeous HD graphics
